colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES YANG ZAB 'KHOR BA RGYUN GCOD KYI GNAS SBYONGS KYI MAN NGAG 'DI NI GLANG LO MI TRA BRGYA RTZA'I DBANG GI SKABS BSTAN 'DZIN DAM PA'I SKYES MCHOG RNAMS DANG, GDAN SA CHEN PO'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN @009A *, ,RNAMS KYIS BSKUL NGOR, GONG MA CHEN PO'I LUNG GI ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED RVA SGRENG AA CHE THU NO MONG HANG DU 'BOD PA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS BZHI SDE DGA' LDAN BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA DZA YANTU, ,)
